Posts.Content: SpringFever2011 wrote: HI all - I am new here -- I was DXed a few weeks ago -- and am just "getting started" (pre-op & pre-treatment --- IDC  8mm ER+(95%)/PR+(95%)HER2- with the process ... I was wondering ...  **** How often is the histology report from a lumpectomy different then that of the original biopsy .....---I had my biopsy at one hospital and have elected to work with a different breast group/hospital --and was just wondering how often hisology differs. **I was also wondering how often other tpyes of cancer cells are found from the lumpectomy report ..... Thanks! Log in to post a reply
